ReferenceDocuments.name: CDASH Implementation Notes
ReferenceDocuments.description: Sponsor should specify the next phase of the study or the related study on the CRF. The data are to be used to aid in monitoring and data cleaning. No specific SDTM-based dataset mapping rules are provided since the mapping depends on the situation (next epoch or next trial). Per sponsor-decision, plans to enter the next epoch within a study may be included in the SDTM submission datasets (e.g., SE). Actual subject entry into the next study is submitted as part of Trial Design datasets of that study.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Case Report Form Completion Instructions
ReferenceDocuments.description: Identifies the planned subsequent [study epoch/study] in which the subject intends to participate.
